title: Gifting RP Not Working on Legacy Client
body: I do not know if this is known but gifting RP on the legacy client is not working.  I know gifting is not on the alpha client yet but I thought it was supposed to work on the legacy.  Is this an issue on my end or is there something wrong on Riots side.

replies.body:
Due to a technical issue, RP gifting is not currently available, as mentioned on the [NA Server Status Page.](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LdLVfA1X,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-24T05:39:12.636+0000)
>
> Due to a technical issue, RP gifting is not currently available, as mentioned on the [NA Server Status Page.](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Do you have an eta of when it'll be back up?

I don't have an ETA, but I'd recommend periodically checking in on that server status page for any updates.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Same Issue for me on EUW. Button on the "Finalize" Screen does nothing.
